title: Singapore pledges $112M to foster fintech and web3 innovation
description:
The Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) said it would commit 150 million Singapore Dollars, around $112 million, during the course of three years under the renewed Financial Sector Technology and Innovation (FSTI 3.0) Scheme to support FinTech solutions, including Web3 projects. According to an Aug. 7 statement, the MAS stated that the fund seeks to […]

title: OpenAI Introduces GPTBot Web Crawler with Privacy Controls
description: OpenAI has quietly launched GPTBot, a dedicated web crawler designed to gather data for its AI models. However, website administrators now can prevent the crawler from collecting information. This move aims to enhance data privacy and accuracy in OpenAI’s AI models. The company has added instructions for opting out of the crawling process in its ... Read more

title: Here Are the Top Five Crypto Firms Securing Over $30M in Funding in July
description:
